There’s no denying Apple’s massive reputation in the tech world. And it appears it’s not just hype — our reviews put an Apple product at the top of our buying guides to [tablets](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/best-tablets-150026056.html), [smartwatches](https://www.engadget.com/wearables/best-smartwatches-153013118.html), [smartphones](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/smartphones/best-smartphones-140004900.html) and [laptops](https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/best-laptops-120008636.html). But Apple devices aren’t cheap. That’s why it’s a good idea to wait for Apple [Black Friday](https://www.engadget.com/black-friday/) deals. You won’t find pure discounts at Apple’s site, but retailers like Amazon, Walmart, Target, Best Buy and more are happy to discount iPads, Apple Watches, MacBooks, and AirPods— and we’ve rounded up the best sales right here. Check out the [best Black Friday](https://www.engadget.com/deals/we-found-the-best-black-friday-2025-deals-on-tech-from-amazon-apple-lego-ninja-and-more-ahead-of-the-big-sale-100052689.html) Apple deals below.

## Apple Black Friday deals: AirPods

[**AirPods 4 (with ANC) for $100 ($79 off) at Amazon**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DGJ7HYG1&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=AirPods+4+%28with+ANC%29+for+%24100+%28%2479+off%29+at+Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdKN0hZRzE_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiOGU3NWM3MmEtODA3OC00MDZmLWJiMWItOWM3NjcxMzM0MGMzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdKN0hZRzEiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAATI-3dlMYraiQDm9VXCcBd4ZuPRQJg8E3w_vcyeJ6ckg&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DGJ7HYG1): If you just need moderate noise cancellation and prefer an open-wear fit (where nothing goes in your ear canal), you may prefer the new AirPods 4. They don’t have heart rate sensing or the [hearing features](https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/why-the-airpods-pros-new-hearing-aid-features-are-a-bigger-deal-than-you-think-111543985.html) the Pro models have. But [we found the sound quality](https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/apple-airpods-4-review-pro-features-for-everyone-120032046.html) to be pretty good and appreciated Pro-level features like live translation. Also at [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_11384707978&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&&signature=AQAAARhC3nYmmLspHiwwc6TvJxx2eYYHoWrrc9XGUiZWUOqN&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FApple-AirPods-4-with-Active-Noise-Cancellation%2F11384707978) and $140 at [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAAeN0HikXvdkGZ-BiRTt8QXBe3EtWxLxZV9s_vD25W3ZQ&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-airpods-4-with-active-noise-cancellation-white%2FJJGCQ832YX).

[**AirPods 4 (no ANC) for $80 ($50 off) at Amazon**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DGHMNQ5Z&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=AirPods+4+%28no+ANC%29+for+%2480+%28%2450+off%29+at+Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdITU5RNVo_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiOGU3NWM3MmEtODA3OC00MDZmLWJiMWItOWM3NjcxMzM0MGMzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwREdITU5RNVoiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAAWiTKWHgjGmEV5OVHCze3nLgJ45CmXzy0AB-mCQImAPK&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DGHMNQ5Z): You miss out on a few more features on the base-model AirPods 4: no live translation, no noise cancellation and no heart rate sensing, but you do get Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking, like on the pricer models. We gave the entry-level buds [an 88 in our review](https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/apple-airpods-4-review-pro-features-for-everyone-120032046.html). The previous low price was $89. [**AirPods Max for $430 ($120 off) at Walmart**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_11375169740&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=AirPods+Max+for+%24430+%28%24120+off%29+at+Walmart&&signature=AQAAAeZhUOAqifpsnl9H5N875zPtSCwUUF4bYzUSBCOUBkad&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAirPods-Max-Starlight%2F11375169740): These cans have been around for quite some time now, only getting the slightest upgrade with [a new USB-C port](https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/apple-refreshes-its-airpods-max-with-new-colors-and-usb-c-174330979.html) in 2024. The hardware is otherwise the same as it was when the over-ear headphones debuted in 2020. Still, they’re comfortable, have good sound quality and the on-board controls are unique but good. ## Apple Black Friday deals: iPads

[**iPad Air (M3, 11-inch, 128GB) for $449 ($151 off) at Amazon**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZ74YQ1V&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=iPad+Air+%28M3%2C+11-inch%2C+128GB%29+for+%24449+%28%24151+off%29+at+Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRFo3NFlRMVY_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiOGU3NWM3MmEtODA3OC00MDZmLWJiMWItOWM3NjcxMzM0MGMzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRFo3NFlRMVYiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAAcoonO24Kmifknx_3pymVl3I4yXNPrzWVk0WZK3WALLY&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DZ74YQ1V): The Air is the Goldilocks Apple tablet. It strikes the perfect balance between price and performance, making it our overall pick for [the best iPad you can buy](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/best-ipads-how-to-pick-the-best-apple-tablet-for-you-150054066.html). The build is lovely; it feels premium and the display is a big improvement over Apple’s base-model slate. The M3 chip is [plenty fast for everyday use](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/ipad-air-m3-review-a-modest-update-thats-still-easy-to-recommend-130045196.html) and can handle an average day of productivity no problem, particularly with its improved multi-tasking abilities. This matches the lowest price we've tracked. Also on sale at [Target](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=827d7835-78d6-4491-ae04-c042cab1d6e7&itemId=impact_radius_2092-91121998&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Target&linkText=Target&&signature=AQAAAfWBeLnsgxP30ZSe1uW67mabeT2IcrrXOXcxBgmadYn_&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fp%2Fapple-ipad-air-m3-11-inch-wi-fi-128gb-blue%2F-%2FA-91121998) and [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAAUxmYv2bLr0iGROgznuUlHkk29dfOeMuWNeG4EjNkb0O&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-11-inch-ipad-air-m3-chip-built-for-apple-intelligence-wi-fi-128gb-starlight%2FJJGCQ8V4LF). 

[**iPad Air (M3, 13-inch, 128GB) for $649 ($150 off) at Amazon**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZ749BQ2&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=8e75c72a-8078-406f-bb1b-9c76713340c3&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=iPad+Air+%28M3%2C+13-inch%2C+128GB%29+for+%24649+%28%24150+off%29+at+Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRFo3NDlCUTI_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiOGU3NWM3MmEtODA3OC00MDZmLWJiMWItOWM3NjcxMzM0MGMzIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRFo3NDlCUTIiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAAcI4vTKpY-iMBCLplk_A4iNRl7lOHqNOCtDFNPFu66mp&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DZ749BQ2): A larger screen will make watching shows and playing games more expansive. And if you use your iPad more like a personal computer, you’ll appreciate the extra real estate for spreading out your work. Like the 11-inch Air, this has a powerful M3 chip and an excellent screen, as well as support for the Apple Pencil Pro and [Apple Intelligence](https://www.engadget.com/ai/apple-intelligence-announcements-at-wwdc-everything-apple-revealed-for-ios-macos-and-more-171133645.html). ## Apple Black Friday deals: Accessories
